{{Event
|name              = Iridescent Cloud-Striding
|image             = Iridescent Cloud-Striding.png
|type              = Sub
|time_known        = yes
|time_start        = 2024-02-07 04:00:00
|time_end          = 2024-02-26 03:59:59
}}
{{Description|There are many wondrous things here in [[Chenyu Vale]]. Make skillful use of the "[[Golden Carp's Leap]]" to agilely traverse the mountains of Chenyu Vale, collect Jade Lotus Lanterns, and reach the destination as quickly as possible.}}
'''Iridescent Cloud-Striding''' is part of the [[Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze]] event in [[Version 4.4]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 1.png
|text1  = During Iridescent Cloud-Striding challenges, you must {{Color|help|reach your destination}} while collecting as many {{Color|help|Jade Lotus Lanterns}} on the way to obtain a score as high as possible.
|image2 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 2.png
|text2  = {{Color|help|Ominous Lanterns}} will be present during the challenge. You will {{Color|help|have points deducted}} if you pick them up.<br>After you come into contact with {{Color|help|Fireworks Lanterns}}, they will explode, and you will trigger the pick-up effects of {{Color|help|all objects}} within the explosion radius.
|image3 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 3.png
|text3  = There will be "Cunning Plans" to be picked up near the Golden Carp's Leap pearls. These can help you complete the coming challenges.
|image4 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 4.png
|text4  = After picking a "Cunning Plan: Cash Advance" up, Jade Lotus Lanterns will appear before you for a limited time. This will help you obtain a higher score.
|image5 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 5.png
|text5 = After picking a "Cunning Plan: Crisis Adaptation" up, Ominous Lanterns before you will regularly turn into Tranquil Lanterns. Take this opportunity to score more points.
|image6 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding 6.png
|text6  = After picking a "Cunning Plan: Pyrotechnical Amusement," special moving Fireworks Lanterns will appear before you, and during the next Golden Carp's Leap, you will score double points.
}}

==Challenges==
===I: Expeditious Excursion===
{{Description|When you unfurl your wind glider and soar through the skies, you are as a brush against a canvas of night sky, drawing clear lines as you glide at full speed toward your target.}}
Unlocks 2024-02-07 04{{Colon}}00

Location: [[Chenyu Vale: Southern Mountain]], [[Liyue]]<br>
[[File:Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Iridescent Cloud-Striding Expeditious Excursion Location.png|300px]]
